messages.subject: school shootings was Law & Order
messages.msgSnippet: School shootings may be rare events but we had one HERE in a small town outside of Albany, NY last week.  A 16 year old boy shot a teacher with a shot gun. The
messages.messageBody:
School shootings may be rare events but we had one HERE in a small town
outside of Albany, NY last week. A 16 year old boy shot a teacher with a shot gun.
The teacher is ok, was shot in the leg.
But of course, you never think it will happen near you.
I don't know if it made the NATIONAL news or not because no one was killed,
but perhaps these do happen more often and we don't hear about them. Did
anyone out there hear about this incident? It was at Columbia High School in East
Greenbush, NY.
Amanda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
